faqs.q: How many calories is in Bud Light per bottle?
faqs.a: About 110 calories in a standard 12 oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Bud Light?
faqs.a: 6.6 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Bud Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many light beers at 110 kcal; some like Michelob Ultra are lower at 95 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Bud Light?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
